languages.text: [Ответить столь же многозначительно] "Наверняка, для столь кровавой трапезы была причина".
[Answer just as obliquely] "There must have been a reason for this bloody repast."
languages.original_text: [Ответить столь же многозначительно] "Наверняка, для столь кровавой трапезы была причина".

traits.locale_text: [Answer just as obliquely] "There must have been a reason for this bloody repast."

[Answer just as obliquely] "There must have been a reason for this bloody repast."

languages.text: [以同样拐弯抹角的方式回答]“这场血腥的盛宴，一定是有原因的。”
languages.original_text: [Answer just as obliquely] "There must have been a reason for this bloody repast."

traits.locale_text: [以同样拐弯抹角的方式回答]“这场血腥的盛宴，一定是有原因的。”

languages.text: ［同じように斜に構えて答える］「この血なまぐさい食事も何か理由があるということか」
languages.original_text: [Answer just as obliquely] "There must have been a reason for this bloody repast."

traits.locale_text: ［同じように斜に構えて答える］「この血なまぐさい食事も何か理由があるということか」

languages.text: [Dar una respuesta igual de evasiva] «Debe de haber una razón para esta sangrienta comida».
languages.original_text: [Answer just as obliquely] "There must have been a reason for this bloody repast."

traits.locale_text: [Dar una respuesta igual de evasiva] «Debe de haber una razón para esta sangrienta comida».

languages.text: [Répondre de manière tout aussi indirecte] « Il doit bien y avoir une autre raison à ce repas sanglant. »
languages.original_text: [Answer just as obliquely] "There must have been a reason for this bloody repast."

traits.locale_text: [Répondre de manière tout aussi indirecte] « Il doit bien y avoir une autre raison à ce repas sanglant. »

languages.text: [Ebenso indirekt antworten] "Es muss einen Grund für diese blutige Mahlzeit geben."
languages.original_text: [Answer just as obliquely] "There must have been a reason for this bloody repast."

traits.locale_text: [Ebenso indirekt antworten] "Es muss einen Grund für diese blutige Mahlzeit geben."

languages.text: [Aynı şekilde dolambaçlı bir cevap ver] "Bu kan içindeki yemeği yemenin bir nedeni olmalı."
languages.original_text: [Answer just as obliquely] "There must have been a reason for this bloody repast."

traits.locale_text: [Aynı şekilde dolambaçlı bir cevap ver] "Bu kan içindeki yemeğin bir nedeni olmalı."
